original_text: Then Pharaoh called for Moses and Aaron, and said, Intreat the Lord, that he may take away the frogs from me, and from my people; and I will let the people go, that they may do sacrifice unto the Lord.
korean_text: 바로가 모세와 아론을 불러 이르되 여호와께 구하여 나와 내 백성에게서 개구리를 떠나게 하라 내가 이 백성을 보내리니 그들이 여호와께 제사를 드릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh called for Moses and Aaron
that he may take away the frogs from me
and I will let the people go
that they may do sacrifice unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 여호와께 제사를 드리게 하기 위하여
